В хозяйстве Соня на сегодняшний день имеет 2 коровы, 11 овец. Также есть земельный надел, 1,47 ГА собственной земли, где она выращивает картофель, кукурузу для реализации. Совокупная прибыль Сони составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). Соня вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для откорма и увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого молока. Это позволит Сони развить бизнес и увеличить доход от бизнес деятельности.
texts.en:
Sonya has repaid her loan, having used the funds as needed. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who responded and helped her with financing. On the farm today Sonya has two cows and eleven sheep. She also owns a 1.47 land plot, where she cultivates potatoes and corn for sale. Sonya's total income is about 20,000 som (KGS). 

Sonya is again applying to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) in order to buy a dairy cow for fattening and increasing her volume of organic milk sales. This will allow Sonya to develop her business and increase her income from the business.

loans.use: to buy one dairy cow in order to increase the volume of organic milk sales

loans.name: Seyilbu

texts.ru: Сейилбу, 49 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее высшее образование, работает секретарем в сельской управе, также ведет собственное дело- занимается сельским хозяйством. Благодаря упорному труду Сейилбу, в хозяйстве есть 10 коров, 13 овец, 5 лошадей. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 35,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего дела, Сейилбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Сейилбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Seyilbu is 49 years old, married, and has three children. She has higher education, and works as a secretary in the village administration, in addition to running her own business - she farms. Thanks to Seyilbu's persistent hard work, on the farm there are ten cows, 13 sheep, and five horses. The monthly income is about 35,000 som (KGS). 

With the view of further developing her business, Seyilbu has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) in order to buy calves for fattening and resale. Seyilbu plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to buy additional calves for fattening and resale

loans.name: Annette

texts.en:
Annette is a 33-year-old farmer from a remote village in Bagao in the Kericho area of Kenya. She resides with her husband and family. She has been actively involved in farming for the past five years and has never regretted it or looked back. She practices mixed farming and sells milk, eggs, and various food crops at the local market. Annette passionately loves poultry farming, but the biggest challenge she faces is a lack of capital to buy quality breeds of poultry that are resistant to diseases and lay more eggs. 

Annette is seeking a loan to purchase additional poultry. She will use her excess maize to feed the poultry and will provide sorghum to give the poultry energy and green grams (beans) for protein. Through better feeding, the poultry will increase their egg production and will lay more eggs that are of good quality, which will translate to more income. Apart from an increase egg production, she will get increased output from poultry meat, and this will further increase her income and profit margins. Through increased profits, she intends to turn around her living conditions and live a better life. 

In addition to profits, Annette will benefit from chicken manure, which contains the highest amount of nitrogen of any livestock manure and is very valuable as fertilizer. She will be able to save money that would have been spent to buy fertilizer. 

Thanks to your support, Annette will succeed in making her dreams come true; take action and give a loan!

loans.use: to buy poultry

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 48 years old and married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Analiza has a motorcycle repair shop business in the Philippines. Analiza requested an 8,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for her repair shop.

Analiza has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Analiza would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her motorcycle repair shop

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina works hard to support her family. Gina is married with seven children now and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Gina requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fishing materials such as fish nets, gasoline for her boat, and bamboo for the maintenance of her business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Gina has been in this business for four years now and also earns additional income from buy and sell vitamins and liniments.

In the future, Gina would like to save money to expand her business and save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials such as fish nets, gasoline for her boat, and bamboo for the maintenance of her business

loans.name: Prudence

texts.en:
Prudence is a single woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food, school fees, and rent. 

She has operated a beauty salon business for the past 10 years. She operates from home, providing services to everyone with access to her area of operation. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. She dreams of expanding her business in future

With the loan of 50,000 KES she is requesting, she wants to purchase machines such as a blow dryer and other requirements for her beauty salon business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase machines like a blow dryier and other requirements for her beauty salon business

loans.name: Wilter

texts.en:
Wilter is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has both electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past five years, she has operated a kiosk business, selling food stuff such as maize flour, maize flour, cooking fat, and also stationery to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the 50,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase additional stock of maize flour, rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, and stationary. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of maize flour, rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, and stationary.

loans.name: Kelsin

texts.ru: Келсин, 29 лет, замужем, 2 сыновей. Образование - среднее. На протяжении 6 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, у нее есть 2,80 ГА земельного надела, где выращивает фасоль, также есть 3 коровы, продает экологически чистое молоко. Всю самостоятельно выращенную продукцию, она реализует оптовым покупателям. Келсин на сегодняшний день успешный предприниматель, она получает ежемесячную прибыль около 19,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего полеводческого хозяйства, Келсин обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и удобрений для обработки почвы и выращивания экологически чистой продукции. На доходы от кредита Келсин планирует и дальше развивать свое дело.
texts.en:
Kelsin is 29 years old, married, and has two sons. She has secondary education. For six years she has worked in animal husbandry and agriculture. She has a 2.80 hectare land plot where she cultivates beans, and also has three cows, and she sells organic milk. She sells all her independently produced goods to wholesale buyers. Today Kelsin is a successful entrepreneur, and she receives a monthly income of about 19,000 som (KGS). 

With the view of further developing her agriculture business, Kelsin has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) in order to buy a cow, and fertilisers to cultivate the land and grow organic products. Kelsin plans to further develop her business with the funds from the loan.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for land cultivation and one cow in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Komila

texts.ru: Комила молодая мать троих детей. Комила родилась и выросла в семье служащих.  Комила заботливая мать и трудолюбивая женщина. Выйдя  замуж  Комила все свою любовь посвятила семье. Всеми своими силами она старается помогать мужу. У них большая и дружная семья.  Она живет вместе с родителями мужа. Своим трудолюбием она получила доверие со стороны семьи мужа. Они ее очень любят как свою дочь. Семья Комилы содержит скот. Она доит коров. Из молока сама изготавливает молочные продукты как кефир, сметану, творог и продает их. И этим зарабатывает на жизнь. Муж Комилы Гулом тоже прекрасный человек. Он работает дехканином и выращивает овощи и корм для скотов. В этом году Гулом получил хороший урожай. После реализации заработал хорошие деньги.  Посоветовавшись  с  семьей  на эти деньги  они решили увеличить поголовье скотов и зимой заняться скотоводством. Но на накопленные деньги  они смогут купить только пару скотов.  Поэтому у них не хватила  средств и Комила обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом. На полученный кредит они купят несколько голов скота.
texts.en:
Komila is a young mother of three children. Komila was born and raised in a white-collar family. Komila is a caring mother and hardworking woman. Being married, Komila has devoted all her love to her family. She tries to help her husband to the best of her ability. They have a large and amiable family. She lives with her husband's parents. She has won the trust of her husband's family with her industriousness. They love her very much, like they would their own daughter. 

Komila's family raises cattle. She milks cows. She makes dairy products from the milk herself, such as kefir, smetana, and tvorog, and sells it. She makes a living through this. Komila's husband Gulom also is a wonderful person. He works as a farmer and cultivates vegetables and feed for the cattle. This year Gulom received a good harvest, and after sales he received a good income. 

Having consulted with their family about this money, they have decided to increase their cattle headcount and do animal husbandry in the winter. But with their savings they will be able to buy only a pair of cattle. They do not have enough funds, thus Komila has applied to MDO Arvand for a loan. With the received loan they will buy a few heads of cattle.

loans.use: to buy some cattle

loans.name: Lina Maria

texts.es:
Lina, orgullosa campesina de 31 años de edad, reside en el municipio de sonson, junto con su esposo se dedican a las actividades agrícolas tales como a cría de animales, producción de leche y cultivo de hortalizas, son una familia humilde, pujante y trabajadora que se esfuerzan enormemente en hacer lo mejor posible su labor para brindarle un excelente futuro a su pequeño hijo de 3 años de edad.
Lina solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para el mantenimiento y erradicación de plagas de sus terrenos, tales como insecticidas, fungicidas, fertilizantes y el pago de la mano de obra para aplicar los productos.
texts.en:
Lina, aged 31, is a proud farmer. She lives in the town of Sonsón with her husband, and together they raise livestock, produce milk, and cultivate vegetables. This humble, determined couple work very hard to ensure a great future for their young son, who is three.

Lina is requesting a loan for buying agricultural supplies for the farm, such as insecticides, fungicides, and fertilizers, as well as labor to apply these products.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and insecticides for crops.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.ru: Чамила очень ответственная в работе женщина. Ей 52 года, она замужем и имеет большую семью. Проживает она в славном городе Курган-Тюбе и занимается бизнесом на рынке. Муж и старший сын Чамили работают таксистами. Сама Чамила также старается, чтобы ее семья не нуждалась в чем и делает для этого все возможное. Второй сын Чамили в данный момент учиться на третьем курсе в одном из университетов города Душанбе. Ему нужно оплатить за обучение. В этой связи Чамила обратилась за кредитом, и просит у Вас помощи в получении кредита, чтобы его сына не отчислили.
texts.en: Jamila is a responsible woman. She is 52, married, and has a large family. She lives in the excellent city of Qurgan-Tube and has a business at the market. Her husband and eldest son are taxi drivers. Jamila herself works hard to meet her family's needs and does everything possible. Her second son is currently in his third year of university in Dushanbe and he needs help paying for his tuition. This is why Jamila applied for a loan, so her son won't have to stop his studies.

loans.use: To pay for her son's university tuition

loans.name: Abdygany

texts.ru: Абдыганы, 62 года, женат, есть 2 детей. Образование- среднее. Абдыганы на пенсии, также работает трактористом на собственном тракторе. Дополнительно вместе с супругой занимаются сельским хозяйством. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Абдыганы, у него есть 2 коровы и 2 овцы. На 0,83 Га земли, выращивает кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Абдыганы обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита он планирует вложить в покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Abdygany is 62, married, and has two children. He has a high school education, is retired, and drives his own tractor. He and his wife are farmers and earn around 15,000 som (KGS) per month. Thanks to Abygany's hard work he currently has two cows and two sheep and a 0.83 hectare plot of land where he grows corn to sell and to use on the farm. In order to develop his business, he applied for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy cows to increase his herd. He plans to use the earnings from the loan to purchase furniture for his home.

loans.use: to purchase some cows in order to increase his herd

loans.name: Mavlyudahon

texts.ru: Мавлюдахон успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению, она приобрела вакуумный массажный аппарат и фито-бочку. У нее стало больше клиентов. Мавлюдахон не привыкла останавливаться на достигнутом, поэтому она вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку материалов и хочет оплатить свое обучение японской технике массажа, так как это очень популярная сфера. Доходы от кредита она планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Mavlyudahon successfully repaid her previous loan, having used it for the intended purpose of purchasing a vacuum-massage device and a phyto-barrel, which resulted in more clients coming to her shop. Mavlyudahon is not accustomed to staying still, so she applied for a new loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy supplies and to study Japanese massage techniques, which are very popular. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in developing her business.

loans.use: to study a new Japanese massage technique and to buy additional materials in order to increase her number of clients

loans.name: Caren Andrea

texts.es:
Caren es una joven de 22 años de edad que se dedica a prestar servicios de peluquería en un negocio propio el cual inicio en el año 2012, persiguiendo sus sueños de pagar sus estudios de educación superior y sacar su familia adelante.
Pensando en mejorar sus ventas la joven quiere solicitar un préstamo para tener productos de los que usa en sus cortes para la venta, por ello con el dinero comprara una vitrina exhibidora y la abastecerá con productos de estética corporal y capilar.
texts.en:
Caren, aged 22, runs her own hairdressing business, which she set up in 2012 in order to pay for her higher education studies, and to help support her family.

This young woman is requesting a loan so that she can improve her earnings by selling the products she uses when cutting hair. She will purchase a display case and fill it with beauty products for skin care and hair.

loans.use: to buy a display case and fill it with beauty supplies in order to improve her earnings.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза женщина с открытой душой. У нее чистое сердце. Фирузе 40 лет. Она замужем и имеет детей. Она талантливая и трудолюбивая женщина района Шахритус. На районе многие жители занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Фируза тоже имеет не большой земельный участок и имеет пару голов коров во дворе. Она хочет заниматься портнихой. Ей это ремесло очень нравится. Фируза давно мечтала стать опытной рукодельницей на районе. Но у нее не было возможности приобрести себе швейную машинку. Она накопила денег, и Фируза немного устроилась из-за нехватки денег.  Цель ее кредита является приобретения швейную машинку и скорее начать новый бизнес. Фируза верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Firuza is a woman with an open mind and a pure heart. She is 40, married, and has children. She is a talented and hardworking woman from the Shahrituz district, where many residents are farmers. Firuza also has a small plot of land and a pair of cows in the yard. She wants to be a seamstress because she likes the craft. She has dreamed for a long time of becoming an experienced seamstress in the region, but she did not have the opportunity to buy a sewing machine. She saved money but got a bit stuck because she did not have enough money. She wants to use the loan to buy a sewing machine and start a business. She trusts in you and your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and start a new business.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 61 años de edad la cual se dedica a la confección directa, su producto estrella es las pijamas, debido a la temporada de diciembre tiene gran volumen de trabajo, que le representara buenos ingresos para seguir persiguiendo su sueño de comprar una vivienda propia.
La cliente solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para dar abasto a la demanda presente, el dinero será invertido principalmente en compra de insumos como: hilos, agujas, cintas, accesorios decorativos para prendas.
texts.en:
Ana is a 61-year-old woman who works as a dressmaker. Pijamas are her most popular product. Due to the December season, she has a large volume of work, which will mean a good income to continue pursuing her dream of buying her own home.

Ana is requesting a loan to buy supplies in order to meet the present demand. The money will be used mainly to buy supplies like thread, needles, ribbon, and decorative accessories for clothing.

loans.use: to buy supplies like thread, needles, ribbons, and decorative accessories for clothing.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es:
Viviana es una hermosa joven de 28 años de edad, no tiene hijos es soltera y muy liberal, trabaja diariamente en la venta de mercancía por temporadas, con ello genera el dinero para su sustento, es feliz realizando está actividad y su sueño es crecer como empresaria, montar un local comercial y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Actualmente la cliente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar un surtido completo de ropa para hombre, principalmente camisas, camisetas y pantalones. 
Este préstamo nace de la necesidad de aprovechar la temporada de fin de año.
texts.en: Viviana is a beautiful young 28-year old. She does not have any children, is single and very liberal. She works every day selling seasonal merchandise. With this, she gets money for her food. She is happy doing this job and her dream is to grow as a businesswoman, set up a shop and improve her quality of life. Currently she is asking for a loan to buy a whole assortment of men's clothing, mainly shirts, t-shirts and pants. This loan comes from the need to take advantage of the end-of-the-year season.

loans.use: to buy a whole assortment of men's clothing, mainly shirts and pants.

loans.name: Yeison David

texts.es:
En agosto del presente año el señor Yeison tomó una decisión muy importante en su vida, junto unos ahorros que tenía y monto un negocio propio de venta de frutas y verduras, buscando mejorar su calidad de vida, generar mayores recursos y así construir un mejor futuro para su familia en especial para su hijo de 2 años de edad.
Para aprovechar de la mejor manera posible la temporada de fin de año, el señor Yeison quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecerse de frutas y verduras, comprando gradualmente dichos productos ya que son alimentos que se vencen muy rápidamente.
texts.en: In August of this year, Yeison made a very important decision in his life. He gathered some savings that he had and set up his own business selling fruits and vegetables, looking to improve his quality of life by getting better means and thus building a better future for his family, especially for his 2-year old son. To take advantage of the end-of-the-year season in the best way possible, Yeison wants to ask for a loan to stock up on fruits and vegetables, gradually buying said products because they are foods that expire quickly.

loans.use: to have working capital to gradually supply his fruit and vegetable business.

loans.name: Danys Edelmira

texts.es:
Danys es una mujer de 31 años de edad que vive en unión libre con su pareja con la cual tiene dos hijos de 14 y 10 años de edad.
El futuro de sus hijos llevo a Danys a iniciar un negocio de cría y venta de pollos, quería apoyar a su pareja en los gastos y que juntos construyan un hogar con mejores recursos y aspiraciones para la vida.
Las condiciones climáticas y los altos costos de insumos han sido el principal enemigo de la cliente, ya que por estos motivos algunos de sus animales han muerto, por ello hoy quiere acudir a la ayuda de un préstamo para comprar materiales para la adecuación de sus galpones, construcción de un galpón nuevo y pollos para poblarlo.
Espera que con esta inversión las condiciones de su negocio cambien, mejore sus ventas y logre ser una empresaria más competitiva en el mercado.
texts.en: Danys is a 31-year old woman who lives in a common-law marriage with her partner, with whom she has two children ages 10 and 14. The future of her children led Danys to start a business raising and selling chickens. She wanted to support her partner with the expenses and that together they build a home with better resources and life aspirations. The climate conditions and high costs of supplies have been her main enemy and for these reasons some of her animals have died. Now she wants to turn to a loan to buy materials for the adaptation of her sheds, to build a new shed and chickens to fill it. She hopes that with this investment, her business conditions change, her sales improve and she manages to be a more competitive businesswoman in the market.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a shed and stock it with birds.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.en:
Soledad is a 55-year-old married woman with six children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Soledad has a business buying and selling root crops in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years.

Soledad requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of root crops to sell at her local market.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of root crops to sell at her local market.

loans.name: Janneth Alexandra

texts.es: Janeth tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil divorciada, tiene 2 hijos Wilmer de 18 y David de 11 años de edad estudian en unidades educativas del sector tuvo que abandonar el campo y salir a la ciudad a buscar la manera de que sus hijos estudien y puedan estar juntos hace 10 años  confecciona y remienda prendas de vestir este ha sido su unico sustento con el que ha podido pagar la alimentación, educación el lugar donde viven con sus hijos, hoy Janeth necesita el dinero para comprar chanchos ella aspira  tener otra pequeña fuente de ingresos para poder seguir cubriendo las necesidades de sus hijos.
texts.en: Janneth is 40-years old and divorced. She has two children, Wilmer age 18 and David age 11, who go to school in the area. She had to abandon the country and go to the city to look for a way for her children to study and to be together. For 10 years she has made and repaired items of clothing. This has been her only support with which she has been able to pay for food, education and the place where she lives with her children. Now Janneth needs the money to buy pigs. She hopes to have another small source of income to be able to keep covering her children's needs.

loans.use: to buy pigs as a hope to have another small income.

loans.name: Aida Luz

texts.es:
Aida es una mujer casada de 44 años de edad que se dedica a las actividades agrícolas, aprendió de su esposo rápidamente la actividad, ella es una mujer con visión, con sueños, no se quedó solo trabajando, quiso tener sus terrenos y con mucho esfuerzo constituyo un cultivo propio con el cual genera sus recursos para satisfacer sus necesidades y deseos y lo más importante para construir un futuro para su familia, la cual la terminan de conformar sus tres hijos.
Ella solicita un préstamo para seguir construyendo un gran cultivo, dicho dinero será usado en insumos de mantenimiento como abonos, pesticidas, fungicidas, insecticidas, gallinaza y también en semillas y riegos para nuevas plantaciones.
texts.en: Aida is a married 44-year old woman who works in agriculture. She learned this job quickly from her husband. She is a woman with vision and dreams. She was not only working, she wanted to have her land and with much effort she built her own crops with which she gets the resources to satisfy her needs and wishes. The most important is to build a future for her family, which completes the picture of three children. She is asking for a loan to keep building a great crop. This money will be used on maintenance supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, fungicides, insecticides, hen droppings and also seeds and irrigation for new fields.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides, fungicides, insecticides, hen droppings and also seeds and irrigation for new fields.

loans.name: Aida Isabel

texts.es:
Aida es una mujer de 51 años de edad, perseverante, muy enfocada en sus metas y sueños, ella se dedica a la confección directa, actividad que lleva realizando durante 20 años, con la esperanza e ilusión de ver su marca en las mejores pasarelas del país.
Ella continuara trabajando, impulsando su estilo y será feliz si puede brindar a la comunidad prendas innovadoras a un precio favorable.
Aida solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos principalmente telas, broches y artículos decorativos para blusas de dama.
texts.en:
Aida is a 51-year-old woman, persevering, and very focused on her goals and dreams. She works in direct tailoring, a business that she has been doing for 20 years with the hope and illusion of seeing her own brand on the nation's best runways.

She will continue working, driving her style forward, and will be happy if she could bring innovative garments to the community at a favorable price.

Alda is requesting a loan to purchase materials, mainly fabric, broaches, and decorative articles for women's blouses.

loans.use: purchase materials, mainly fabric, broaches, and decorative articles for women's blouses

loans.name: Jose Hector

texts.es:
José es un noble campesino de 55 años de edad que se dedica al cultivo, su familia está conformada por 6 hijos y su esposa, su único deseo es tener salud para trabajar en sus terrenos y llevar el alimento diario a su hogar.
Este gran hombre se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para iniciar nuevos cultivos, tales como semillas, abonos y riegos.
El préstamo nace de la necesidad ya que actualmente estos insumos tienen un alto costo.
texts.en:
José is a noble farmer of 55 years old who works in cultivation. His family consists of six children and his wife. His only wish is to have the health to work in his fields and to take food home everyday.

This great man is requesting a loan to buy agricultural materials to start a new cultivation, including seeds and fertilizers as well as to pay for irrigation. The loan is being requested because these materials have high prices these days.

loans.use: buy agricultural materials to start a new cultivation such as seeds and fertilizers, as well as to pay for irrigation

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 56 years old and married with three children.

Teresita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 38,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, coffee, soft drinks, spices, eggs, bread, snack foods, and other personal care products.

Teresita has borrowed and repaid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from buying and selling frozen foods.

Teresita aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, coffee, soft drinks, spices, eggs, bread, snack foods, and other personal care products.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia earns a living by means of raising hogs. She raises and sells hogs to the local settlers in her place. She is a fifty-seven-year old married woman with six grown children. Aside from hog raising, she also engages in farming and grows rice.

She needs additional funds to continue to improve her livelihood.

She decided to join CEVI to access a loan to invest in fertilizer and feed. These could help boost her source of income and slowly enable her to settle her obligations.

She is thankful for the funds and is determined to manage it successfully to become financially stable.

loans.use: to invest in fertilizer and feed.

loans.name: Raul Antonio

texts.es:
Raúl es un honorable campesino de 32 años de edad, padre de dos hijas de 10 y 6, vive en unión libre con su pareja, el cual se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para ampliar sus cultivos de tomate de aliño (verdura).
Este préstamo nace de la necesidad de ampliar sus terrenos para generar buenos recursos con los que espera construir un excelente futuro a sus hijos y su mayor sueño es comprar una vivienda que sea fruto de su esfuerzo y de su trabajo, la cual hereda a su familia.
El dinero será usado en la compra de semillas, abonos y riegos.
texts.en:
Raúl is an honorable farmer of 32 years old, father of two daughters of ages 10 and 6. He lives in a civil union with his partner.

He is requesting a loan to expand his cultivation of tomatoes for aliño (a Colombian seasoning). The loan comes from the need to expand his land to generate good resources, with which he hopes to build an excellent future with his children. His biggest dream is to buy a house that would be the fruit of his effort and work, and inherit it to his family.

The money will be used in the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, and irrigation services.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers, and irrigation services, to have a new plantation of tomatoes for aliño.

loans.name: Hakika Group

texts.en:
Muzney, who is in her late 20s, is single and has two schooling children.

She has been running two projects, transportation (motorcycle) and buying and selling cashew nuts for two years now. She works from 6 a.m. to 7 p.m. daily and is able to make fair monthly profit.

This will be Muzney's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase the cashew nuts stock and to buy spares for her motorcycle and has paid back all her loans successfully.

She used the profit to pay school fees for her children, repay the loans, reinvest in business and cover household expenses.

She will use this loan to service her motorcycle and to increase her cashew nuts stock. She dreams of becoming an international business woman.

Muzney will share this loan with her loan group, Hakika, which has four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group, which is doing great!

loans.use: to service her motorcycle and to increase her cashew nuts stock.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Rosalinda works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell nipa roofing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs and a general store.

Rosalinda is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more nipa roofing to sell at her stall.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Rosalinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional nipa roofing to sell.

loans.name: Yolanda Del Socorro

texts.es:
El olor nacatamales, plato típico de Nicaragua, corre por toda la casa de Yolanda, madre soltera de 49 años de edad, quien ha salido adelante con sus cuatro hijos que ahora todos son independientes. Además de este platico, ella vende tortillas, para no perder la clientela que ya tiene establecida. 
Su sueño es verse crecer y ver a sus hijos caer económica y moralmente. Razón por la cual solicita un préstamo para comprar leña, bolsas, tomate, masa, carne de cerdo y de pollo, entre otros ingredientes necesarios para elaborar los nacatamales de gran prestigio de la cuadra. Su metas próxima es planear algo para incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The smell of nacatamales, a typical dish from Nicaragua, permeates Yolanda's entire house. A single mother, 49, she has made it through with her four children who are all by now independent. In addition to this dish, she also sells tortillas so that she will not lose her established clientele.

Her dream is to better herself and see her children grow economically and morally. This is why she is applying for a loan. She will buy firewood, bags, tomatoes, flour, pork meat and chicken meat, among other ingredients needed to prepare the nacatamales of great renown in her block. 

Yolanda's next goal is to come up with a plan to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy firewood, bags, tomatoes, flour, pork meat and chicken meat.

loans.name: Vanis Vanessa

texts.es:
Vanis es una mujer muy recursiva, emprendedora, una persona que a pesar de la falta de oportunidades ha salido adelante, no tiene grandes recursos, solo su creatividad para generar recursos, ella adecuo un espacio en su hogar e inicio una venta de sanduches, vende también bebidas, café, principalmente en las mañanas.
Al momento de iniciar con la actividad se había trazado la meta de mejorar en todos los aspectos las condiciones de su vivienda y aunque de momento el negocio le dé para cubrir sus necesidades básicas es creyente de que la situación mejorara y podrá ver su sueño cumplirse.
Vanis actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar la materia prima con la cual elabora los sanduches, carnes frías, pan, tomate, queso, lechuga, también surtido de refrescos y café.
texts.en:
Vanis is a resourceful and entrepreneurial woman, who, despite having had few opportunities in life, has managed to get ahead. She has few resources besides her creativity to draw upon for earning an income, and came up with the idea of starting a business preparing sandwiches, coffee and drinks in her home. She is busiest in the mornings.

When she started her business, her goal was to improve all aspects of her home, although, for the moment, her income covers the basic necessities. She believes that things will improve and she will achieve her goal.

Vanis is requesting a loan to purchase materials for making sandwiches such as cold meats, bread, tomato, cheese, lettuce, as well as coffee and drinks.

loans.use: to buy cold meats, bread, tomatoes, cheese, lettuce, a selection of drinks and coffees for her business selling sandwiches and drinks.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes and her family live a simple life in the city of Baybay, Leyte. Agnes is a mother of two young children; they are six and three years old. She is a 37-year-woman who dreams of a sustainable means living: having enough money for daily consumption and expenses. As for now, Agnes works hard for their family.

She has earned a living by selling accessories for seven years with the help of her husband. She needs additional capital to continue running their business. She will use the money to buy accessories such as necklaces, earrings, bracelets, hair clips, head bands, mirrors, toys and masks.

loans.use: to buy accessories such as necklaces, earrings, bracelets, hair clips, head bands, mirrors, toys and masks.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 45 years old and single. She has six children.

Analiza works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from buy and sell charcoal.

Analiza requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, coffee, soft drinks, spices, eggs, bread, snack foods and other products.

Analiza has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. Analiza aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, coffee, soft drinks, spices, eggs, bread, snack foods and other products.

loans.name: Andry Sofia

texts.es:
Andry es una mujer cabeza de familia la cual se encuentra solicitando tu apoyo para abastecer su tienda de productos de la canasta familiar.
Ella es una joven de 26 años de edad la cual tiene un pequeño de 4, se separó de su esposo y ahora con su tienda espera lograr generar el sustento para ella y su hijo, construir un futuro y en más adelante pensar en comprar una vivienda.
sueños que puede lograr con tu apoyo y también colocando todas las ganas, empeño, ilusión y optimismo para triunfar.
texts.en:
Andry is a female head of the family who is requesting your support to supply basic goods products to her shop.

She is a young woman of 26 years old and has a little son of four. She separated with her husband. With her shop, she now hopes to generate the means of living for her son and her, build a future, and further in the future buy a house-- dreams that she can achieve with your support and also by giving it all and making her every effort.

loans.use: to supply basic goods products to her shop

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda runs a sari-sari (variety) store selling commodities, such as noodles, milk, sugar, seasonings, soap, shampoo and assorted canned goods. She is married woman with two grown children. Her store is situated in front of her house and serves neighbors and other people who live nearby. Due to high demand for basic goods, Imelda wants to stock her store with a variety of merchandise.
She has applied for a loan to buy assorted groceries, such as canned goods, edible oil, seasoning and toiletries. In this way, she can put her capital to work, and then set aside some of the profit for future use. Imelda is grateful to Kiva for the continued support.

loans.use: to purchase assorted groceries to sell, such as canned goods, edible oil, seasoning and toiletries.

loans.name: Gilma De Las Misericordias

texts.es: Gilma es una mujer de 55 años de edad que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de dos vacas, puesto que el bajo precio de venta de leche tiene muy afectado la economía de su negocio, está actividad la ha realizado durante muchos años y espera que la venta de leche siga siendo la actividad que caracterice la familia, por ello solicita el préstamo pues quiere regular sus ingreso a partir de un aumento de ventas.
texts.en:
Gilma is a 55-year-old woman who is requesting a loan to buy two cows, as the low milk prices have strongly affected her business. She has been working in this business for many years, and hopes that sales of milk will continue being her family's characteristic activity.

For this, she is requesting a loan, as she wants to regulate her income by increasing sales.

loans.use: buy two cows to regulate the production of milk

loans.name: Geovanny

texts.es:
Geovanny es un joven de 20 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de mercancía como ropa, lociones, alimentos, cosméticos, productos capilares y faciales.
Para seguir con su crecimiento empresarial el joven quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de 2 vitrinas, de igual manera invertir en mercancía como lociones, ropa y cremas faciales para hombre, mujer, niña y niño.
Su sueño es poder montar un local comercial y tener éxito con su negocio.
texts.en:
Geovanny is a young man of 20 years old who sells merchandise such as clothes, lotion, snacks, cosmetics, and hair and facial products.

To continue the growth of his business, the young man wants to request a loan to buy two showcases, and in the same manner invest in merchandise such as lotions, clothing, and facial cream for men, women, girls, and boys.

His dream is to be able to start a commercial shop and be successful with his business.

loans.use: buy 2 showcases, and in the same manner invest in merchandise such as lotions, clothing, and facial cream for men, women, girls, and boys

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en: Alicia is a married woman who lives with her family in the town of Mahaplag in Leyte, Philippines. She is the mother of four children. The oldest child is 15 years old and the youngest is 2. Her husband contributes to their expenses through farming, while Alicia buys and sells personal collection (PC) products. She successfully started this business few months ago. The profit that Alicia earns is a great help in covering their daily expenses, such as food costs and other household expenses. With this loan, she will buy commodities to sell, such as home care, personal care, health, baby care and beauty products, as well as fragrances, which will help her increase her earnings. In the future, Alicia hopes her business will be successful, so that she and her family can have better lives in the future.

loans.use: to buy commodities to sell, such as home care, personal care, health, baby care and beauty products, as well as fragrances.

loans.name: Eliseo

texts.es:
Eliseo con 30 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa familiar,junto a su cónyuge y sus tres hijas, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a prestar servicio como jornalero agrícola por su zona de residencia y alrededores, desde hace más de 5 años. Solicita préstamo para la compra de animales y alimentos para estos. De esta manera le facilitará aumentar los ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida para él y para la de su familia.

Eliseo no cuenta con experiencia crediticia, es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Eliseo, 30 years old and with a partner, lives in a family house together with his partner and their three daughters in the district of Cayaltí, Province of Chiclayo, Department of Lambayeque, Perú. He counts on very good personal and work-related references from the inhabitants of the area. The majority of the inhabitants work in agriculture, commerce, and cattle raising.

For more than five years, he has been working as an agricultural day laborer, offering his service in his area of residence and the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan to buy animals and animal feed. In this way he can increase the income for a better quality of life for himself and for his family.

Eliseo does not have a credit history, as he is a new member for Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn works hard to support her family. She is married, has five children, and runs a food-vending business in the Philippines. Analyn has been in this business for 15 years, and she earns additional income by buying and selling ready-to-wear clothing.
Analyn successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has applied for another loan to continue building her businesses. Her PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF will help her to buy meat, chicken nuggets, fish balls and other ingredients for her food production business.
In the future, Analyn would like to build and expand her business, in order to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken nuggets, fish balls and other ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Melly

texts.en:
Melly is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Melly is 56 years old and has one child still in school.

Melly has a business buying and selling bananas in the Philippines. Melly requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy sacks of banana to sell for her business.

Melly has been in this business for 20 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of banana to sell for her business

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a 42-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a civil servant and has worked as a teacher for more than 15 years.  Outside of school he farms, growing bananas on a large scale. He is charged with the responsibility of paying school fees for his children and looking after them by meeting all the basic needs at home. He is described as a very hardworking man who has a vision of constructing a good house for his family. Patrick has asked for a loan to help him pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Nursuluv

texts.ru: Нурсулув, 27 лет, замужем, есть 5 детей, младшей дочери 2 года. У Нурсулув средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Нурсулув, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 коровы, 15 овец и лошадь. На участке мерою 1,56 Га земли, она выращивает арбузы и хлопок для реализации. Ежемесячный доход - порядка 14,000 сом (KGS). Нурсулув решила обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Нурсулув намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи и в будущем позволит отремонтировать дом.
texts.en: Nursuluv is 27, married, and has five children. Her youngest daughter is two years old. Nursuluv has a vocational education and earns the main income for her family by raising livestock and planting crops. Thanks to her perseverance, dedication, and hard work, she currently has two cows, fifteen sheep, and one horse. She grows watermenlon and cotton to sell on a 1.56 hectare plot of land and earns around 14,000 som (KGS) per month. Nursuluv decided to apply for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy two cows to increase her herd. She intends to expand her business, which will lead to an increase in her family's income and allow her to repair her home in the future.

loans.use: to buy two cows in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Silvia Elena

texts.es:
Silvia es una mujer de 60 años de edad que genera recursos gracias a un negocio de venta de mercancía, ella vive junto con esposo, trabaja por necesidad, por querer tener una vida digna y recursos para satisfacer sus necesidades y deseos, siempre ha sido muy liberal y le ha gustado contar con su propio capital.
Ella a su edad sigue soñando con comprar una vivienda propia, es su mayor deseo y espera lograrlo algún día.
Actualmente la cliente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para abastecer su negocio con lociones, artículos decorativos, cosmético, accesorios entre otros, todo para atender la demanda de fin de año.
texts.en:
Silvia is a 60 year old woman who generates resources thanks to a retail business. She lives with her husband and works out of necessity, wanting to have a dignified life with resources to satisfy her needs and wishes. She has always been very liberal and has liked to count on her own capital.
Even at her age, she continues to dream with purchasing her own home. It is her biggest wish and she hopes to achieve it one day. Currently the client is requesting a loan to stock her business with lotions, decorative articles, cosmetics and accessories among others in order to attend to the end-of-year demand.

loans.use: stock her business with lotions, decorative articles, cosmetics and accessories among others.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 38 лет. Она родилась в семье дехканина.  Так как она была старшим ребенком в семье, всегда помогала своим родителям по хозяйству. Поэтому с детства она была приучена труду. После окончание школы она сдала вступительные экзамены в ВУЗ чтобы получить высшее образование. Но ей не повезло и она не смогла поступить. Она была сильна духом и стала дальше усовершенствовать свои знание самостоятельно. Она устроилась на работу чтобы помогать своим родителям содержать семью. Почти год она работала и после этого ее выдали замуж. Теперь Нигора любимая жена и заботливая мать  троих детей.  Муж Нигоры работает грузчиком на железнодорожной станции. То что он зарабатывает хватает для содержание семьи. А сама Нигора занимается шитьем национальных платьев. У неё свой маленький  цех. У неё свои клиенты и ученики.  Доходы полученные от шитья платьев она накопила и хотела сделать ремонт дома. С этими деньгами она начала ремонтировать квартиру. Но так как цены на товары каждым днем растут она не смогла закончить ремонт до конца. И у них появились финансовые нехватки.  Услышав о кредитном  продукте “Зеленый кредит ” она обратилась в ООО МДО Арванд за кредитом. Получив кредит она доделает ремонт дома и установит современные пластиковые окно и двери. Нигора благодарит Арванд за качественную и своевременную поддержку.
texts.en: Nigora is a hardworking woman, aged 38. She was born in a family of farmers and always helped her parents on the farm because she was the eldest child. Since childhood she has been accustomed to working. After finishing high school she passed the entrance exams for university in order to get a higher education, but it did not work out and she was not able to enroll. She had a strong spirit and began to improve her knowledge on her own. She found a job in order to help her parents take care of the family. She worked for almost a year and then got married. Now Nigora is a beloved wife and a caring mother of three children. Nigora's husband loads cargo at the train station and earns enough to support the family, but Nigora also sews traditional dresses and has a small shop with clients and students. She has been saving the money she earns from sewing for renovations to their house and began paying for repairs with this money. She was not able to complete the renovations because the price of goods went up and she did not have enough money. When she heard about "green loans" she applied for one with MDO Arvand. After receiving the loan she will complete the repairs and install modern plastic windows and doors. Nigora thanks Arvand for their useful and timely support.

loans.use: to install plastic doors and windows

loans.name: Ra'nogul

texts.ru: Человек праздник, всегда молода душой, прекрасное чувство умора-это все про нее. Про эту милую леди по имени Раъногул. Раногул родом из района Хуросон, здесь же она живет и работает. Она живет вместе с мужем. Ее муж работает пекарем. Сама Раъногул занимается шитьем одежды. Она шьет классическую национальную женскую одежду. Раъногул готовится к зиме и подготавливает дом к холодному периоду года. Для этого она хочет купить стройматериалы и отремонтировать некоторые части дома, чтобы зимой сохранить тепло в доме. Раъногул планирует приобрести стройматериалы за счет заемных средств и обещает, как честный человек во время погашать кредит.
texts.en: Ranogul is always young at heart and has a great sense of humor. She is from the Khuroson district, where she lives and works. She lives with her husband, who is a baker. Ranogul sews clothing, specifically traditional women's clothing. She is preparing for winter and getting the house ready for the cold season. To do this she wants to buy building materials to renovate some parts of the house to be able to keep the house warm. Ranogul is planning to buy building materials with the borrowed money and promises to repay it like an honest person.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and renovate her house

loans.name: Sulaymon

texts.en: Sulaymon is very polite, well-mannered, person. He is 38 years old, married and the father of three children. He lives in the J. Rumi region. Sulaymon has years of experience in crop production. His wife helps him in his work. In this way, they make a living and provide for their children. Sulaymon has planted vegetables, and he needs to buy fertilizer. Also, he wants to buy wheat seeds to plant. This is why Sulaymon has applied for a loan. He hopes that you will not refuse to help him, and he promises that he will repay his loan on the time.

loans.use: to buy wheat seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Victor Raul

texts.es:
Victor Raúl con 63 años de edad, de estado civil casado,vive en casa propia junto a su esposa, en el distrito de Querocotillo,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café de la variedad Catimor, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 10 años. El préstamo lo utilizará como capital de trabajo, específicamente para la compra de abonos y labores culturales del café. Esta inversión lo ayudará a tener mayor capital y así tener mayor liquidez para desarrollar la actividad mencionada.

Victor Raúl es socio recurrente con 03 créditos en Edpyme Alternativa el cuál fue pagado puntualmente.
texts.en:
Victor Raul is 63 years old, his civil status is married and he lives with his wife in their own home in the Querocotillo district, of the Cutervo province in the Cajamarca department of Peru. He has really good references, both personal and working, from the area's residents. The majority of the inhabitants of the area make their living in agriculture, commerce and cattle raising. 
He works in agriculture, specifically the harvest of coffee of the Catimor variety, with 10 years of experience in the field. He will use the loan as working capital, specifically for the purchase of fertilizers and cultural labors of coffee. This investment will help him have better capital and this way have better liquidity to develop the aforementioned activity.
Victor Raul is a recurrent partner with 3 credits in Edpyme Alternativa, which he has been paying punctually.

loans.use: have working capital, especially for the purchase of fertilizers and cultural labors of coffee.

loans.name: Remelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Remelyn works hard to support her family. She has a vulcanizing shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buy and sell recycled materials. Remelyn is borrowing 17,000 PHP through NWTF to buy materials for her vulcanizing shop business like spare parts and engine oil, and pay for maintenance of her business. 

Remelyn successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more recycled materials.

loans.name: Luz Stella

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 42 años de edad la cual trabaja en su casa en un negocio de cría de animales el cual inició por necesidad económica ante el afán de generar recursos para pagar la educación de sus amadas hijas de 7 y 10 años de edad.
Sus hijas son el motor de su vida, por ellas realiza grandes esfuerzos, espera con su negocio triunfar y generar buenos recursos con los que espera reformar su hogar y lo más importante ahorrar para enviar a sus hijas en un futuro a una buena universidad ya que en vereda no cuentan con dichas instituciones.
Luz quiere solicitar un préstamo para aumentar su producción de cría de animales, el dinero será para la compra de pollos de engorde y cerdos.
texts.en:
Luz is a 42 year old woman who works out of her home in an animal raising business which she started out of economic necessity, precipitated by her eagerness to generate resources to pay for the education of her two daughters, ages 7 and 10, who she loves. Her daughters are the engine of her life, for them she makes the biggest efforts. She hopes that through her business she can succeed and generate good resources with which she hopes to remodel their home and, most importantly, save up to send her daughters to a good university in the future as there are no such institutions in their town.
Luz wants to request a loan to increase her animal raising production, the money will be used to purchase broiler chickens and pigs.

loans.use: increase her animal raising production, the money will be used to purchase broiler chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit is a 41-year-old married man from the Kareli district. He lives with his wife, son and daughter-in-law and an infant granddaughter. Davit's wife teaches at a local school and receives a monthly salary. He is engaged in agricultural activities, growing fruits and vegetables. He wants to open a food market and has begun building out a commercial space, where his market is going to be located. He needs money to finish building and renovation and to buy a stock of products.

The Start Up Program, a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, makes it possible for him to get a loan of 6,000 GEL. With the credit, he will finish the renovation process, and he will also buy stock of products. Davit has no experience in this field, but he is very motivated and hopes that his new business will be successful for his family.

loans.use: to open a food market and generate a stable income.

loans.name: Feliciano Jose

texts.es:
Feliciano es un hombre soltero de 25 años de edad, una persona humilde pero trabajadora que necesita de tu apoyo para sacar adelante su negocio de cría y venta de pollos, no cuenta con muchos recursos y ese negocio es el que le da para comer, por medio de un préstamo busca invertir en pollos y alimento de engorde.
Feliciano ha realizado está actividad pro años, con el apoyo le estarías dando la herramienta a un joven trabajador de luchar por sus sueños, de luchar por una vida digna y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Feliciano, aged 25 and single, is a humble and hard-working man who needs your help to make his business of raising and selling chickens a success. He has few resources, and this business provides him with the basic necessities. He will use the loan to buy chickens and weight-gaining feed.

Feliciano has been working for several years in this business, and your support will give this young man the tools to achieve his dreams of a decent life and a better future.

loans.use: to buy chicken and  weight-gaining feed, in order to improve his sales and be able to meet his financial obligations.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro es un hombre, honesto, trabajador, honrado el cual se dedica a las actividades de cría y venta de cerdos y pollos, un negocio que inicio por herencia de su familia, por necesidad económica y pro ser la actividad más rentable en la que ha trabajado.
Su propósito en su vida es trabajar para su familia, darles una buena calidad de vida, por darle a su hijo el cual tiene 5 años de edad, buenas bases para que crezca, estudie y busque un futuro prometedor.
El cliente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pollos, alimento, cerdos, para abastecer sus porquerizas y galpones, teniendo animales disponibles para atender la demanda de fin de año.
texts.en:
Alejandro is an honest, hard-working and honorable man who raises and sells pigs and chickens. He began the business after a family inheritance, out of economic necessity and because it generated more income than other jobs that he had done.

His aim in life is to work for his family and give them a good quality of life, and to ensure his 5-year-old son has good foundations for growing, studying and finding a promising future.

He is requesting a loan to buy chickens, food and pigs for his business, in order to meet customer demand for the end of year celebrations.

loans.use: to buy chickens, food and pigs for his business.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en: Farzana, 35 years old, is a very enthusiastic person. She is a married lady, shown in the photo with her husband. They deal in business selling hair accessories, jewelry, beauty products and purses, etc. Both are working together to cover their daily expenses. To meet increasing demand, she has requested a loan of PKR 60,000 to buy additional hair accessories such as clips, hair bands and hair pins along with jewelry items including earrings and rings. She is positive about her future earnings and wishes to spend it on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy additional hair accessories such as clips, hair bands and hair pins along with jewelry items including earrings and rings.

loans.name: Piedad Clemencia

texts.es: Piedad tiene 56 años de edad, de estado civil casada su esposo es albañil pero por la falta de empleo le ayuda a trabajar a su esposa, tienen un hijo Anderson  estudia en una unidad educativa del sector, Piedad se dedica a la crianza de terneros pero también  cose cintas en la fabricación de pantalones su esfuerzo se redobla ya que constantemente es responsable con estas dos pequeñas fuentes de ingresos para tratar de que su hijo siga estudiando. Ella necesita el dinero para invertir comprara  hilos, cintas, materia prima por mayor obtendría mejores ingresos los costos bajan así podría seguir satisfaciendo sus necesidades básicas a futuro aspira tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Piedad is 56 years old, married. Her husband is a construction worker, but because of unemployment, he helps his wife's work. They have a son named Anderson, who studies at the neighborhood school.

Piedad raises calves but also sews tapes for the production of pants. Her efforts redouble as she is constantly responsible for these two small sources of income in order to have her son continue studying.

She needs the money to invest in thread, tapes, and raw material at wholesale. She will obtain better income as the costs fall, and in this way she will be able to continue meeting her basic needs. In the future, she aspires to have her own house.

loans.use: buy raw material

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard, 34, offers tailoring services in Hoima, Uganda. To supplement his income and earn a living, he also engages in farming. He is married and has five children, and he looks forward to educating them, since he never had a chance to study. He has hopes of developing his business, despite the challenges of competition and the lack of better machines to carry out specific services, like Baby Lock sewing and designing equipment. Richard needs a loan to buy sewing materials ahead of the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy materials for sewing in preparation for the Christmas season.

loans.name: Sophat's Group

texts.en: Sophat’s group live in a rural village in Kampot province in Cambodia. Sophat makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as village coordinatior to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Sav's Group

texts.en: Sav’s group live in a rural village in Kampot province in Cambodia. Sav makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as seller by selling grocery to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Sarum's Group

texts.en: Sarum’s group live in a rural village in Kampot province in Cambodia. Sarum makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Monica Andrea

texts.es:
Mónica es una joven de 22 años de edad la cual se dedica a la cría de ganado bovino, ella es una madre soltera cabeza de familia, tiene un pequeño hijo de 2 años de edad por el cual luchar y sacar un negocio adelante.
Para ella lo más importante es consolidar un negocio firme y duradero en el tiempo. La cliente desea solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una vaca, desea aumentar su producción y así obtener mejores recursos para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
texts.en:
Mónica is a 22-years-old young woman who raises cows. She is a single mother of a 2-year-old son and his primary caregiver for whom she fights for and works hard so her business can stay afloat. 
The most inportant thing for her to to have a solid business that can last over time. She is asking for a loan to buy a cow to increase production and generate a better income to support her household.

loans.use: to buy a cow to increase her production and generate a better income to support her household

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is a produce dealer living in Hoima, Uganda. He is married and tasked with taking care of four children, all of whom attend school. He has been in business since 2005 and also farms and raises poultry and pigs for extra income. He has testified that these businesses have created a big change in his life and the entire family’s life style. However, he faces a challenge of high prices of the feeds for his animals. He is asking for a loan to buy more chicks for the poultry business.

loans.use: to buy more chicks for his poultry business.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is 37 years old married to Josia and blessed with two children aged 8 and 5 years old.

She has been into vegetable and dairy products farming business for eight years and earns a monthly income of Kshs.35,000.

This being her first loan with VisionFund Kenya,she intends to buy dairy feeds for her cows.

With the anticipated profits, she will be able to help the husband in paying school fees for their children from the expanded business profits.

loans.use: to buy dairy feeds for her cows

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a hardworking married man with four children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He also looks after other six other dependents who live with him at home. He used his previous loan to buy more bags of maize and coffee to sell. He still deals in the buying and selling of coffee, maize and beans as a main source of income. However, he also practices farming to supplement on his food stuff and earnings. He is planning to buy more land to help him expand on the gardening work but he has been challenged by little capital alongside seasonality changes.
He is requesting for a loan to buy more dry maize, coffee, beans and others to sell.

loans.use: to buy more dry maize, coffee, beans and others to sell.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 49 years old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, canned goods, groceries, etc. to sell.

Roselyn has been in this business for 7 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, canned goods, groceries, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Denis

texts.en: Denis is a father of 1 child, aged 31 and lives in Hoima Uganda. He deals in electronics predominantly selling phones, cables as well as repairing them among other items. This is supplemented by farming mostly growing cassava, beans and rice. He hopes to grow and expand his business plus opening up new outlets in the nearby villages only to be limited by insufficient capital plus inflation. Denis will use the loan facility to buy  more phones and cables for sell.

loans.use: to buy  more phones and cables for sell.

loans.name: Paula Andrea

texts.es:
Paula es una mujer de 26 años de edad la cual está solicitando un préstamo para pagar un curso extensivo de bizcocho y cubiertas dictado por la corporación Interactuar.
Ella  tiene dos hijos de 9 y 2 años de edad, trabaja realizando oficios varios, pero en sus ratos libres elabora postres que vende a sus vecinas.
La intención de realizar el curso es mejorar sus técnicas, preparar tortas de mejor sabor y en un futuro montar un negocio de postres y tortas.
texts.en:
Paula is a 26-year-old woman who is asking for a loan to pay for an extensive course in cake backing and coating, set up by Interactuar.
She has two children, ages 9 and 2. She has different jobs but in her free time she sells desserts to her neighbors.
Her goal is to take this class and improve her techniques, make tastier cakes and, in the future, open a cake and dessert store.

loans.use: to pay for cake backing and coating classes (bakery)

loans.name: Catty Yuler

texts.es:
Catty es na joven de 22 años de edad, que monto un negocio de panadería, ella no tiene hijos ni pareja, solo un deseo de salir adelante, progresar, mantener a su madre y en un futuro poder comprarle una vivienda al ser que más ama en el planeta que es su mamá.
Ella actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para adecuar su negocio y acogerse bajo las normas de las entidades reguladoras. 
Con el dinero Catty quiere comprar un nuevo horno, colocar piso en cerámica al local, comprar nuevas bandejas, comprar insumos al por mayor.
El monto es debido a las adecuaciones y el valor del horno.
texts.en:
Catty is a 22-year-old young woman who runs a bakery. She is single and has no children, but a firm desire to get ahead, make progress, support her mother and, in the future, be able to buy a house for her and mom is the person the loves the most in the planet.
She is asking for a loan to make renovations to the business and comply with the regulatory entities regulations.
With the money, Catty wants to buy a new oven, install ceramic flooring in the building, buy new trays and buy supplies in bulk.
The amount was calculated based on the features the wants to add and the value of the oven.

loans.use: to buy a new oven, install ceramic flooring in the building, buy new trays and buy supplies in bulk.

loans.name: Muharrem

texts.en:
Muharrem is a father of eight children and is a widower. He lives in a minority community and has been working as a blacksmith for more than 7 years now. He has a workshop at home that allows him to be around for the children but also be able to earn an income. He also is able to fix wood cutting machines for others for a fee. At this time his children collect iron that Muharrem is able to use for his work. This helps him to be able to make even more of a profit and keep his expenses down.

At this time he is requesting a loan in order to purchase new working tools for his business. His current tools are very worn and damaged from years of wear and tear. He knows that the investment will allow him to produce much higher quality products and attract even more clients. He can also charge a higher rate for his work then and increase his income even more. He wants to thank all of the Kiva lenders for helping him to be able to provide for his family through his business.

loans.use: to purchase new working tools for his business to produce much higher quality products and attract even more clients

loans.name: Jirley Alejandra

texts.es:
Ella es Jirley es una joven madre cabeza de familia de 18 años de edad, su hijo tiene 1 año de edad, se dedica a vender ropa y artículos para bebe, un negocio que monto con su propia esfuerzo y con ayuda de su familia que la apoyan mucho en la tarea de ser madre adolescente.
JIrley abandono mucho su vida, sus estudios, su adolescencia todo por criar a su hijo, lo hace con el mayor compromiso y amor posible.
Su sueño es poder construir un futuro con su hijo, que su negocio crezca y que pueda comprar vivienda y estar solida económicamente.
La cliente quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecer su negocio de artículos y ropa para bebe, entendiendo que se acerca la temporada de fin de año y quiere tener todo listo para ganar muy buenos recursos en sus ventas.
texts.en:
This is Jirley, 18, a young mother and head of the household, her son is one year old. She works selling baby clothing and products, a business that she set up through her own effort and with the help of her family who are supporting her very much in the task of being an adolescent parent. 

Jirley gave up a lot in her life, her studies, her adolescence, all to raise her son, which she is doing with the greatest possible obligation and love.

Her dream is to build a future with her son, to build up her business, to be able to buy her own home and reach economic stability. 

This client is applying for a loan to stock up her business with products and clothing for babies. She knows that the year-end season is approaching and she wants to have everything ready to earn very good income from her sales.

loans.use: to stock up her store with a complete assortment of baby clothing and products.

loans.name: Heng's Group

texts.en: Heng’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Heng does work as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Sorn's Group

texts.en: Sorn’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Sorn does work as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is 41 years old, married, and has nine children. She has been weaving sweaters and carpets for many years. She works hard on her weaver every day so she may earn a living for her family and provide food, healthcare, and education.

Zahida has requested a loan from Kashf Foundation for 40,000 PKR, which she will use to purchase bundles of wool and thread in different colors with packs of needles to increase her sales and earn better profits so as to build her own house.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wool and thread in different colors with packs of needles to increase her sales and earn better profits so as to build her own house.

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga is an entrepreneur from Melitopol. She works at a local marketplace. Olga sells men's and women's denim wear and footwear. She has been working in this branch of trade for 18 years. Olga is married with two grown sons. 
Olga is planning to buy diversified selection of seasonal merchandise: jackets, slim-fit and heavier pairs of jeans, skirts and a variety of boots for sale this winter. Olga needs additional 40 000 Grivnyas to buy this type of inventory to meet seasonal demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy diversified selection of seasonal merchandise: jackets, slim-fit and heavier pairs of jeans, skirts and a variety of boots for sale this winter

loans.name: Sardar

texts.en:
Sardar is 20 years old. He is from the Imishli region and his family lives there. He has started his higher education 2 years ago. He has 3 siblings and parents. Being the only son of the family he is caring towards supporting his old parents such as helping them daily in farming activities during holidays and on the weekends. He is very hard-working person and very passionate about studies. Sardar is labelled as a diligent student at the university. He studies in Baku capital city which is far from his home.

Sardar is studying Mathematics and is very fond of this subject. He knows that Azerbaijan as an independent country for 20 years has a rich history in the field of mathematics. Sardar wants to be a great mathematician. He is thinking of being a expert at this field and working with number is entertaining for him. Currently he requires 1700 AZN. This fund he is going to pay tuition fees and to purchase the university textbooks. He hopes that Kiva lenders will show their support.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fees for a BSc. in Mathematics

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is a 47-year-old woman. She is married and lives in the city of Baybay, Leyte. To earn a living, Alicia is running a sari-sari store (general store) business. She just successfully started this business a few months ago.

She is asking for a loan to buy additional goods to improve this business such as drinks, a sack of rice, flour, spices, canned goods, noodles, candies, chips, and biscuits. In this way, she will be able to reach her goal. She wants to enhance this livelihood for her children’s education. She has five children, two are adults and three are still dependents.

loans.use: to buy drinks, a sack of rice, flour, spices, canned goods, noodles, candies, chips, and biscuits.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is requesting a Kiva loan to buy shoes to sell this festive season. He owns a shoe business and has rentals as his sources of income. He started the businesses to generate income for his family of 4 children and his wife.
